name: 2D Shooter (Final) (sophiagrady)
description:
In this 2D game, the player's objective is to help astronaut survive the battle field in all 3 levels. There is a story to the game that you can read under the "instructions". 

Modifications:

1) The player is an astronaut with a gun above his head. 

2) The background color fades from the bottom to the top.

3)The background color is different in every level.

4) The enemies are a different color in every level. The further the level, the harder it is to see them.

5) The enemies speed, guns, and invincibility changes throughout the levels. 

6) The audio's pitch is deeper for each level. 

7) There is a short story under "Instructions" that explains the objective to the player. 

Credits: 

Astronaut- https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/2d-character-astronaut-18265... 

Created by:

Sophia Grady
